name: metrics_gui
description: Metrics snapshot for the gui tile

connection_count.description: The number of active http connections to the GUI service, excluding connections that have been upgraded to a WebSocket connection

websocket_connection_count.description: The number of active websocket connections to the GUI service

websocket_frames_sent.description: The total number of websocket frames sent to all connections to the GUI service

websocket_frames_received.description: The total number of websocket frames received from all connections to the GUI service

bytes_written.description: The total number of bytes written to all connections to the GUI service

bytes_read.description: The total number of bytes read from all connections to the GUI service
